title: Reconnect to a game that doesn't exist
body: So my last urf game ended and the lobby wasn't loading so I just skipped it.  Now I can't play and when I relog the "Reconnect to game" orange bar is there.  Even though the game is over.

replies.body:
Sounds like a ghost game.  This can happen when the games aren't correctly reported as ended by the game server.  Basically, there's no message from the game server to the client saying "Hey! Game's over now!"   Unfortunately there's not much else to do besides wait in this case.  There's systems in place that should clear these after a maximum of 2 hours, but generally they're far far shorter. 

If you're still seeing this message, let me know!
